data.Name: Madison Cunningham
data.Bio: Madison Cunningham (born in Costa Mesa, CA) is an American singer-songwriter. Homepage: http://www.madisoncunningham.com/ FB: https://www.facebook.com/madisoncunninghammusic/ “Inspiration isn’t a feeling,” says Cunningham. “It’s something that happens every day.” The observation is signature Madison: pragmatic, hard-working, and disarmingly wise in the outset, before bending to reveal hope and a willingness to celebrate the miracles everyone else overlooks. Read more on Last.fm
